sentence.Network_en: Announcements were made over the loudspeaker system.
Their names were called over the loudspeaker .

entry.def: A loudspeaker is a piece of equipment, for example part of a radio or hi-fi system, through which sound comes out.

means.word_mean: 1. electro-acoustic transducer that converts electrical signals into sounds loud enough to be heard at a distance
